column4: Hi, Quck question. I just downloaded a 64 bit Ubuntu, but it says AMD64, but I don't have an AMD processor I have Intel Core 2 Duo, will it work propperly for my laptop?
The current 64-bit CPU architecture was created by AMD, and so it's still often called amd64.
(Intel tried to create something too, called Itanium (aka IA64), but it wasn't successful.)
